divs: sighting detailshi my name is robbie and it was about 9:00 pm in henderson, nv. i was leaving mymoms house and was starting to head s.w. when i noticed this craft in the air.it seemed like it was about 700 feet in the air and it was moving very slow wheni 1st saw it then when i got closer it stopped in the air and hovered. it wasnot a blimp and there was no sound so i know it was not a helicopter. it hadlights going around the bottom of it. i called my mom who was only about 1\2mile from where i was at the time i noticed the craft. she went into herbackyard and confirmed that she was watching it and described it exactly the wayim describing it now. i had to drive past it to go to work but she watched itfor about 10 minutes and she told me that it just continued to hover. shefinally got bored and went into the house. thank you
Summary: circular--stationary in air with lights on bottom-
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
